name: Copy+Switch
description:
Copy+Switch extension allows you to switch the currently selected text with the previously copied text. The switch can only be performed between text fields.

After copying some text from a text field, select a portion of text in another text field and then simply 'Right Click -> Switch' or use the keyboard shortcut 'Ctrl+Shift+V' ('Cmd+Shift+V' on Mac)

switch-selection.description: Switch the currently selected text with the previously copied text
